sanda sonduru ambaa uyane (doltan alwis)- aalayawan manaram - hithumatheta diga giya duwe menma pawana prasangaye gayunu bo mada wagurana kiri kala dahasin - panampaththuwe dingiri amma aacharya nanda malani wenuwen kala ohu thanu janapriya swara rachanawanya (pada-mahacharya sunil aariyarathna) 90 dashakaye nawa parapura niyojanaya kala gayika nirosha wirajini gayu punsanda rata awidin (rathna shri wichesinha) ohuge pasukalina suwisheshi nirmanayaki. 1983 di bandula jayawardhanage berahanda natyaye jathika rupawahini prathinirmanaya ha pasuwa 1992-3 - nidahase themawa ha nidahase ulpatha - 1995-6 sarasawi perahara 1997 di miyuru sara wasanthaya yana meki wadasatahan udesa dayakathwaya dakwamin ohu bihikala githada gananawaki.
yapanaya sarasawiye wasa damunu pita thuna yali wiwruthayi
shithakaranaye aluth wadiyawa sadaha awasi pradhana upakarana

shri lanka dumriya sewaya paththaka thiyamu aruni mokada apata kiyanna puluwanne me wa nadaththuwata mewa pawichchi karana ayagen ayakaranna kiyala, api balamu sarala udaharanayak gannako me telikom sewaya mehi athi wishalama aayojanaya karala thiyanne shri lankawe rajayayi, shri lankawe witharak nemeyi lokaye koheth athiwishala pragdanayak wayawena de karanne ema rate rajayayi rajaya me mudal upayanne rate siyalu janathawata badu gasa.
